definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: It looks like the momentum is growing for a shift towards stream-oriented approach to UI.
sentences.chinese: 看起来UI转向面向数据流方式的势头渐劲。

sentences.english: Now 'we just want to keep the momentum going, ' he said.
sentences.chinese: 刘海平称，现在我们只想继续保持这个良好势头。

sentences.english: Non-state-owned industries continuously maintained a fast growth tendency.
sentences.chinese: 非国有工业继续保持较快增长势头。

sentences.english: The momentum to improve health outcomes has persevered.
sentences.chinese: 改善健康结果的势头也依旧不减。

sentences.english: Let us use it to end AIDS – once and for all.
sentences.chinese: 让我们借此势头，去消灭艾滋病，将它斩草除根。

sentences.english: The test will be whether they can continue that streak.
sentences.chinese: 但能否延续这一强劲势头是他们所面临的考验。

sentences.english: Karel De Gucht said that the Belgian side feels satisfied with the growing momentum of China-Belgium relations.
sentences.chinese: 德古特说，比方对比中关系的良好发展势头感到满意。

sentences.english: The media industry is increasingly hoping it stays that way.
sentences.chinese: 传媒业正日益盼望保持这一势头。

sentences.english: Still, those upward forces eventually will lose some of their oomph, he says.
sentences.chinese: 不过坦普尔说，这些上行力量最终将失去部分势头。

sentences.english: Of course the team expects us to get the same kind of a result from every race.
sentences.chinese: 当然，车队希望我们在每一站都都继续这股势头。

sentences.english: He said that the current Russia-China economic and trade relations enjoy a sound momentum of development.
sentences.chinese: 他表示，当前俄中两国经贸关系呈现良好发展势头。

sentences.english: David Nalbandian is ready come back from injury.
sentences.chinese: 波特罗势头正与日俱增，纳尔班迪安准备复出。

sentences.english: The growth of our business ties has slowed down in recent years, showing a lack of sustained momentum.
sentences.chinese: 中日经贸关系近年来发展势头趋缓，后续动力不足。

sentences.english: In Afghanistan, we must continue to degrade the Taliban.
sentences.chinese: 在阿富汗，我们一定要打掉塔利班的势头。

sentences.english: China-Romania relations have maintained good momentum of development.
sentences.chinese: 中罗关系保持着良好的发展势头。

sentences.english: Wen said that bilateral relations enjoy sound development momentum.
sentences.chinese: 温家宝说，中捷关系发展势头良好。

definition: to advance singing loudly (idiom); triumphant progress
see 勢不可當|势不可当[shi4 bu4 ke3 dang1]
to advance boldly/to push ahead vigorously
lit. late-comer lives above (idiom); the up-and-coming youngster outstrips the older generation/the pupil surpasses the master
